# LineSpacing
Defines line spacing specifics

## Enum
Name | Type | Value | Description
------------ | ------------- | ------------- | -------------
**FONT_SIZE** | **string** | 'FontSize' | Line spacing is font size
**FULL_SIZE** | **string** | 'FullSize' | Line spacing is a full space between descender and ascender
